type: Tutorial Step - Drop it like itâ€™s Hot

definition.text: Being a part of the Governance network is a valuable contribution! As such the airdrop program rewards you with tokens just for being here!

paragraphs.text: The SA token is not a meaningless crypto currency. Consequently, we are not a fan of mindless airdrops. However, since you took the time to create your User Profile you deserve some tokens!
On the Onboarding Programs node click Add Airdrop Program
Now you will receive 1,000 SA tokens at the next distribution if you submit a PR with your User Profile! We'll get to that!
